DOC.brief_summary: Crossover study compare BA DFN-15 3 different dos versus comparator determine dose-proportionality DFN-15 healthy volunteer fast condition
DOC.brief_title: Bioavailabilityof DFN-15 3 Different Doses Versus Comparator Determine Dose-proportionality DFN-15 Healthy Volunteers Under Fasting Conditions
